args.suggestions: implement MFA, update policies, employee training

origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceSecurityAPI.assess_risk', 'description': 'This function assesses the risk of financial information security by analyzing regulations, institutional safeguards, common threats, and suggesting improvements.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'regulations', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'A comma-separated list of relevant financial information security regulations.'}, {'name': 'institutions', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'A comma-separated list of financial institutions to consider.'}, {'name': 'threats', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'A comma-separated list of common financial information security threats.'}, {'name': 'suggestions', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'A comma-separated list of suggestions to improve financial information security.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'risk_assessment', 'description': 'A detailed report on the risk assessment of financial information security.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行

调用工具 FinanceSecurityAPI.assess_risk, 它的参数输入如下: 'regulations'是'PCI_DSS, GDPR, SOX', 'institutions'是'banks, investment firms, insurance companies', 'threats'是'phishing, malware, insider threats', 'suggestions'是'implement MFA, update policies, employee training'.
